conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway with extruded walls, visible thickness, angled/isometric view, and roof removed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Scoring skipped due to automatic rejection (layout/room set mismatch exceeds threshold).

geometric_accuracy.notes: Scoring skipped due to automatic rejection (more than 50% of rooms from 2D plan are missing in 3D).

visual_clarity.notes: Scoring skipped due to automatic rejection.

detected_errors.description: Major geometric failure: the 3D model does not represent the 2D plan (bedrooms, balcony, activity room, bath/WC arrangement, and other labeled rooms/closets are largely absent or replaced by unrelated spaces such as an open living/kitchen and a garage), resulting in >50% room mismatch.

summary: Although the second image is a true 3D cutaway, it is not a faithful 3D transformation of the provided 2D floor plan because most rooms and the overall layout do not match.
